lines.text:
[to Doug Kinney]
Hey Steve, did ya bring me any pizza Steve?

[after having sex with Doug #1's wife]
She touched my pepe, Steve!
Did you bring me a monkey?
You know how when you make a copy of a copy, it's not as sharp as... well... the original.

[to Doug Kinney #1]
Hi Steve!
My life's a shambles. I need pie.
No Clone Nookie Original Nookie Only!
[Doug's rule for his clones]
Nobody has sex with my wife but me.
I've been working since I was twelve; it's break time.
Hey Kinney, I know you think you're hot shit. I'm not falling for this whole go-go attitude. I see through you, my friend.

[to #2]
I'll hit you so hard, I'll kill him!
We're gonna eat a dolphin!
Hey! Lenny. You're not gonna eat a dolphin pal, you're gonna pet one.

[to#4]
I'm gonna buy you something...

[to#1]
A chainsaw?

[to#4]
... Or a book...
Hi. Do you mind if we sit with you?
Have we met?
No.
I like pizza. I *like* it!
We're gonna need a cage.
Bye, Steve! I like Steve.
15 Years ago, I cloned an earthworm.
Well, God bless you, sir.

[not happy about appearance of clone #3. Doug has promised to make it up to him]
And you can start by cloning Laura!

[to his children, Zack and Jennifer who are fighting]
You're both doodie-heads! Go up to your rooms and don't come out until you're married!
We'll have to put in more hours. This isn't just a nine-to-five job. There is a saying where I worked last. "If you don't come in on Saturday, don't bother coming in on Sunday."

[Doug #2 is laying in bed with the flu and Doug #3 has left him alone with Doug #4]
Sorry Steve...
[Doug #2 looks up and sees Doug #4 standing at the foot of his bed with a rubber boot over his head and moves a wood saw back and forth in the air in a sawing motion]
That leg's gonna have to come off.

[to Doug#4 thinking he's her husband]
Please, just tell me what it is that you want.
I want Pizza.
As long as we're both rowing the same boat we'll be fine.
Wherever the road takes us
You know how you can tell when you really love someone? When everyone you see reminds you of him.
